        public org.jdom2.Document doRequest​(String cswRequestXml,
                                    boolean transaction)
                             throws IOException,
                                    org.jdom2.JDOMException,
                                    javax.xml.bind.JAXBException,
                                    OwsException
        Description copied from interface: CswServable
        Posts cswRequestXml to the server. Classes implementing CswServable should supply their own login logic.
        Specified by:
        doRequest in interface CswServable<org.jdom2.Document>
        Returns:
        The response from the server as a String. The String should contain xml.

        IOException
